headline: Oramed and Lifeward Announce Strategic Transaction
summary: Oramed Pharmaceuticals Inc. (NASDAQ: ORMP) (TASE: ORMP) ("Oramed") and Lifeward Ltd. (NASDAQ: LFWD) ("Lifeward") today announced the signing of binding agreements for a strategic transaction between Oramed, Lifeward and a certain accredited investor. The transaction includes the transfer to Lifeward of Oramed's proprietary Protein Oral Drug POD™ delivery technology and Oramed obtaining 49.9% beneficial ownership interest in Lifeward upon the satisfaction of certain terms and conditions. In addit

content.title: Oramed and Lifeward Announce Strategic Transaction

(NASDAQ: LFWD) ("Lifeward") today announced the signing of binding agreements for a strategic transaction between Oramed, Lifeward and a certain accredited investor. The transaction includes the transfer to Lifeward of Oramed's proprietary Protein Oral Drug POD™ delivery technology and Oramed obtaining 49.9% beneficial ownership interest in Lifeward upon the satisfaction of certain terms and conditions.
